content: अंकुरः --रं [अंक्-उर्च् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 38</ls>] {@--1@} A sprout, shoot, blade; दर्भांकुरेण चरणः क्षतः <ls>Ś. 2. 10</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘pointed’, ‘sharp’ &c.; मकरवक्त्रदंष्टांकुरात् <ls>Bh. 2. 4</ls> pointed jaws; नृसिंहस्य नखांकुरा इव <ls>K. 4</ls> pointed nails; कुरंटकविपांडुरं दधति धाम दीपांकुराः <ls>Vb. 4. 1</ls>; पतंगपवनव्यालोलदीपांकुरच्छायाचंचलं <ls>Bh. 3. 68</ls> unsteady like the pointed flame of a lamp; (<ab>fig.</ab>) scion, offspring, progeny; अनेन कस्यापि कुलांकुरेण <ls>Ś. 7. 19</ls> sprout or child of some one; अन्वयांकुरं <ls>Dk. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Water. {@--3@} Blood. {@--4@} A hair. {@--5@} A tumour, swelling.

अंकुरः --रं [अंक्-उर्च् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 38</ls>] {@--1@} A sprout, shoot, blade; दर्भांकुरेण चरणः क्षतः <ls>Ś. 2. 10</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘pointed’, ‘sharp’ &c.; मकरवक्त्रदंष्टांकुरात् <ls>Bh. 2. 4</ls> pointed jaws; नृसिंहस्य नखांकुरा इव <ls>K. 4</ls> pointed nails; कुरंटकविपांडुरं दधति धाम दीपांकुराः <ls>Vb. 4. 1</ls>; पतंगपवनव्यालोलदीपांकुरच्छायाचंचलं <ls>Bh. 3. 68</ls> unsteady like the pointed flame of a lamp; (<ab>fig.</ab>) scion, offspring, progeny; अनेन कस्यापि कुलांकुरेण <ls>Ś. 7. 19</ls> sprout or child of some one; अन्वयांकुरं <ls>Dk. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Water. {@--3@} Blood. {@--4@} A hair. {@--5@} A tumour, swelling.
